Chinese: 这张图片的艺术风格是<a certain artistic style>？
English: Is the style of this image a <a certain artistic style>?

Chinese: 这张图片展示了什么艺术风格？
识别此图像的艺术风格。
English: What art style is showcased in this image?
Identify the art style of this image.

Chinese: 这张图片展示了什么艺术风格？
识别此图像的艺术风格。
English: What art style is showcased in this image?
Identify the art style of this image.
